about_the_game:
Liha is a 3D first-person shooter where you pilot a combat ship with guns that can be modified for more power and more carnage.
Maneuvre through a hell of bullets, take down enemy drones with deflecting rockets and wreak havoc in a bossfight with your quad damage laser shotgun.

Be prepared for deadly combat as you descend into the forsaken structures of a dead earth, to salvage what is left in order to survive.
Fight against an army of machines that have only one purpose: Kill intruders.



And then - there is the Flesh.
A dangerous parasite infesting machines and humans alike. Threatening to devour all that's left on this barren planet,
creating biomechanic abominations that must be taken care of with laser fire and explosives.

  • Intense battles
  • 3 action packed campaigns
  • An arsenal of weapons and powerups
  • Grim dark atmosphere
  • Heavy Duty dark electro soundtrack

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: a 2 Ghz Dual Core of any 64bit description will do
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Your onboard soundcard will cut it
